name: jwt-lite
description: isomorphic library to decode, sign, and verify JSON Web Tokens

scripts.test: npm run test:browser && npm run test:react-native && npm run test:node
scripts.build: microbundle --entry index.ts --output dist --compress false --external all && npm run build:types
scripts.release: npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
